power_guide.power_cord_connect: Connect the power cord to the Pet Care Zone and power it on.

connect_to_wifi.title: Select the Wi-Fi network for Pet Care Zone from the screen below.
connect_to_wifi.wifi_different:
The Wi-Fi to connect is different.
Current Wi-Fi: {currentWifi}
connect_to_wifi.wifi_disconnect:
Disconnected from device. Please connect
the device by going back and pressing the menu again
connect_to_wifi.bluetooth_disconnect:
The Bluetooth connection is disconnected.
Please turn on the Bluetooth of the product first.

check.title: Check the 8-digit PIN code on the Pet Care Zone product screen.

connect.title: Check the 8-digit PIN code on the Pet Care Zone product screen.

register_guide.title: Please stay within 1 meter of the Pet Care Zone. Closer proximity ensures a better connection.

register_process.title: Maintain a close distance to the Pet Care Zone until the setup is complete.

register.title: Pet Care Zone has been successfully added.
register.change_product_name: You can change the product name.
register.register_additional_information: Register additional information for more accurate services
register.register_fail: The product is not registered. Please go back and proceed again.

ai_health_camera.title: AI {type} Health Check
ai_health_camera.guideText: Follow the guide to capture the back view.
